title: Food & Dining

questions.text: When we're deciding what to eat, I'd prefer we...
choices: Try somewhere new we've never been
Go to a reliable favorite we both love
Cook something together at home
Be spontaneous - decide when we're hungry
Other / It depends

questions.text: For cooking at home together, I'd enjoy...
choices: Trying new recipes and experimenting
Making comfort food we both love
One of us cooks while the other keeps company
Ordering in - cooking isn't really our thing
Other / It depends

questions.text: When it comes to meals during the week, I'd like us to...
choices: Plan meals ahead so we know what's for dinner
Have a few go-to options and decide day-of
Wing it completely - see what we're in the mood for
Take turns being in charge of dinner
Other / It depends

questions.text: My ideal food date with you would be...
choices: A fancy restaurant for a special occasion
A cozy spot with great food and no fuss
Street food or a food market adventure
Cooking a meal together at home
Other / It depends

questions.text: When one of us wants to try something the other isn't sure about, I hope we...
choices: Give it a shot - worst case, we don't like it
Find a place that has options for both of us
Take turns picking so we both get our way sometimes
Respect that we don't have to like all the same things
Other / It depends

description: Discover your food adventures and kitchen vibes together.
